title: The Land: South Lancashire coast
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/England - Description and travel

description: This film shows how man has adapted the south Lancashire coastline to meet the needs of work and recreation. The large industrial dockland complex of Liverpool shows how man has completely altered the coastal environment in order to satisfy his economic needs. Suitable for secondary level.
